summary:
They make the sounds of a person running - distracting nearby enemies...
You can create them at the forge using Dwemer Arrows, Leather Strips, Glowing Mushrooms and Mudcrab Chitin.
descriptionHtml:
New improved version merged into my [url=/downloads/file.php?id=12528]Silent Archery mod[/url]

------------------------------------
Request from moebius989

These arrows make the sounds of a person running - distracting nearby enemies... they also glow a little.
You can create them at the forge using Dwemer Arrows, Leather Strips, Glowing Mushrooms and Mudcrab Chitin.
author: ScarabMonkey

files.name: ScarabMonkeyNoisemakers_1-0
files.changelogHtml:
Initial Release - add craftable Noise Arrows
made with custom Ammo, Projectile, Effect, Explosion, CastMarker and Recipe.
